title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1156.2 - Maintenance of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1156.2 - Maintenance of records

State Regulations

The authority and each subsidiary corporation shall
maintain: (a) a record of the final
vote of each member in every proceeding in which such member votes; (b) a record setting forth the name, public
office address, title and salary of every officer or employee of the authority
and subsidiary corporation; and
(c) a reasonably detailed current list, by subject matter, of all records in the
possession of the authority or subsidiary corporation, whether or not available
under the Freedom of Information Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1156.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
